TI: [The neurophysiological mechanisms of the perception of interoceptive signals].
AB: The EEG arousal response was studied in conditions of gastric distension, the arousal response depending on the intensity of the distension. Repeated interoceptive stimuli led to the habituation. The data obtained help to better understand the mechanisms of normal and pathological types of activity of visceral systems.
TT: Nekotorye neirofiziologicheskie mekhanizmy vospriiatiia interotseptivnykh signalov.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1990 Jul;76(7):855-62.
